About Aniway

From now on, you won’t need to ask “Has the shuttle arrived?”. With Aniway, you can order and track your ride in real time. Aniway isn’t just a tool, it’s a partner that makes your company’s day-to-day life easier.

Through our smart automated system, Aniway connects its partners with end customers. Our system makes the booking process easy and quick, allowing you to choose from a wide range of vehicles types – taxis, large cars, buses, and more – all while being informed in advance about the price, with no surprises or additional charges.
